phrases: Oh damn, they are doing it!
Looks like I fell asleep again.
just like always, it disconnected me from this world.
I had a strange, inexplicable feeling.
As if something were buried at the bottom of my memories.
The boy and girl solve each of the dwarves' worries, one by one.
And once they solve the worries, the dwarves say goodbye to the boy and girl and disappear.
I had seen that picture book before.
There was something I was forgetting.
Suddenly, a strange thought ran through my mind.
What if there really was a secret in this world,
and I just could not remember it?
There is a secret in this world.
then clear all the tasks I give you.
If you wish to know it,
We have got a game this Saturday!
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Kyousuke, what is this about a game?
Since our foundation, we, the Little Busters,
have shared in our youths and developed marvelous teamwork.
With that in mind, I have set our first game!
What team are we playing against?
A team worthy of our abilities.
A team consisting entirely of the captains of various sports teams at this school.
Then there is the former captain of the baseball team
and the captain of the judo team.
Though I have to give you credit for assembling a team of such amazing people.
It is safe to assume that they are well-endowed in athletic ability.
There is no way we can win!
Not everyone thinks like you two!
Riki, cannot you say anything but no?
Wait, are not you forgetting something?
We only have eight people on our team.
We are missing one person for a real game.
Nishizono's a manager, so she does not count.
Rin... then there is Kud-o, and Riki.
If you add me, it is ten!
There were two of Riki and me.
I am sure he meant something by it.
Do not be too hard on him.
I just messed up my counting!
It is not a particularly big problem.
I will see what I can do.
I will try to find one more person.
It is only a matter of time before our last member joins.
You already have someone in mind!
Anyway, we are training like crazy for the game!
We are going for the win!
I wonder what Kyousuke's got in mind.
Does he really have someone in mind for the ninth member?
I do not think he does...
Kengo would be such a boon to us if he joined.
He would not change his mind now.
Oh man, they are flirting again.
They were having tea over there the other day.
It is Koshiki Miyuki-san from the archery team.
She is the daughter of a famous line of professional archers.
She was known as a genius, and everyone had high expectations of her...
but she lost her right eye to a disease.
Let us make it super awkward for them!
It looks like they are talking about something important.
Eat up and build that body for the game.
Allow me to introduce a few members of the all-star team.
Saturday's going to be a blast!
It is going to be fun.
I really do not want to!
I do not want to have a game!
I cannot pitch against those crazy strong people!
This is not the time for that.
Can you pitch at them, then?
You begin a battle by controlling your feelings.
Rin, if you hold any anxiety or misgivings towards your opponent,
you have already lost the battle.
You need to control your feelings first.
I will be fighting someone better than me at my match next week.
But everyone says you are set to win the whole thing.
They say you will be bringing home our school's first ever trophy.
The result of the battle is in the hands of the gods.
I will simply swing my sword as myself.
And he made her cry too!
I do not think he is got the right to swing a sword.
There are things you can and cannot say.
I will send you flying to the other side of the school!
I was just asking Miyazawa-san for advice!
Sorry we made things so awkward.
I was simply asking Miyazawa-san's advice as a martial artist.
He is not good with people, but he is a nice guy.
Miyazawa-san simply comforted me like anyone else.
I put everything I had into archery.
And it was all for nothing!
You just think your future is over.
You can find another way of life if you look for it.
A strong person like you who is never once lost hope could never understand!
That is why she feels the pain so strongly.
She is in the depths of despair.
All students are to return to their classrooms immediately.
You may not leave them until further notice.
She is going to give up on life itself?
Killing yourself is just plain wrong!
He could have done something to stop this from happening.
Just study and get wonderful grades!
It does not look like she wants to die.
It is only a minor obstacle!
If Kengo could not do it, those adults definitely cannot.
If you do not, you will be punished!
The fact that your legs are fine can only be explained by your outstanding athletic prowess.
I have taken even your dreams from you.
It will be back to normal in two months.
But you cannot participate in the match anymore!
That is not all it means.
You cannot practice with your team...
What do you mean, practice with your team?
The Kendo Team moderator has suspended Kengo from all practice sessions this term.
Because Kengo pushed his moderator out of the way.
Never do anything like that again.
I will not throw it away again.
I am not trying to guilt you into anything.
You just need to live your life as yourself.
I will live like myself as well.
But you cannot do kendo anymore...
You can find another way to live.
Even if you despair in losing one way.
You will find something else to do.
You are seriously going to bat?!
How are you going to hit with that arm?
Normally, you would not be able to do a full swing,
And even if you could hit the ball, you cannot run with that thing.
I told you not to go easy on me.
Give me all you have got!
He did it with one arm...
As long as I hit home runs, I can run the bases slowly without fear of an out.
Kengo will keep proving that it is true...
That you can find another way to live.
We have got our ninth member!
The Little Busters is now complete!
I never thought I would play baseball.
It is only a matter of time before our last member joins.
He would not change his mind now.
Thanks to a completely unpredictable incident.
I am forgetting something very important.
We have got all our members.
Now I will announce the captain for our first game.
I will not lead the Little Busters from now on.
you are the leader of the Little Busters!
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
Riki, you are our leader for our first game!
That is not going to work.
It is finally time for the game!
